faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Brevy.me

items.question: Are PDFs created with Brevy.me ATS-compatible?
items.answer: Yes. All PDFs generated by Brevy.me are fully compatible with ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems). The content is structured in plain text, without complex formatting or elements that block reading (images behind text, invisible columns, etc.). Recruiters can therefore easily analyze your application.

items.question: What happens to my CV if I stop using Brevy.me or change my subscription?
items.answer: You keep your PDF. Download it at any time before unsubscribing, and it belongs to you permanently. However, your URL will no longer be active, and your online CV will no longer be viewable.

items.question: Are Brevy.me online CVs responsive?
items.answer: Yes. Web pages generated by Brevy.me automatically adapt to computers, mobile devices and tablets. Recruiters can view your CV from any device.

items.question: Can I customize the design of my CV?
items.answer: Of course. You can choose from several modern templates, adjust colors, layout, etc. New layouts are regularly added.

items.question: Can I update my online CV after publishing it?
items.answer: Yes. Each modification is instantly reflected on your web page, without having to republish or share the link again.

items.question: How do I share my Brevy.me CV?
items.answer: You get a unique, short and professional link (brevy.me/cv/name-surname). You can add it to: your applications, your email signature, LinkedIn, your business cards, your portfolio.

items.question: Do you offer a free version?
items.answer: Yes. A free version is available, allowing you to create a modern online CV. The Pro plan allows you to publish multiple CVs online and offers you a wider choice of templates.

items.question: Is the data I provide to Brevy.me secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. Data is stored securely, never sold, and you can delete it at any time.

items.question: How long does my CV stay online?
items.answer: As long as you want. Your web page remains active as long as your account exists, and you can deactivate or delete it at any time.
